Edvard Grieg

Moods, op. 73

1898–1905

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 19' 30"

  • 1. Resignation
  • 2. Scherzo-Impromptu
  • 3. A Ride at Night
  • 4. Folk Melody
  • 5. Study (Hommage à Chopin)
  • 6. Student’s Serenade
  • 7. The Mountaineer’s Song

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · I/2 · Andre originalkomposisjoner · ed. Dag Schjelderup-Ebbe
  • Könemann · K 188 · Holberg-Suite and Moods, Song Arrangements · ed. Thomas Aßmus
  • Peters · EP 3100b · Piano Works / II / Original Works

Difficulty: 2

Difficulty: 3.5
